food.name: Shirataki Noodles
food.comments:
Alleged to be from "Standard Tables of Food Composition in Japan ," 2002 edition, entry for "Konjac, Noodle Shaped" : http://www.shakespeare-w.com/english/konnyaku/nutrition_cal.html
... except that this source indicates 6 Cal/100 g; this was revised to allow for likely fermentation of the remaining carb.
